name: SF-HiSplitter
summary: A special version of Space Fever called SF-Hisplitter was released the same year and features aliens that are double the width of the standard variety, which can either be destroyed completely or split into two smaller aliens depending on where they are shot. This version is in color, and the shelter blocks are visually distinct from the monochrome version.

name: Sf3ra
summary: Eliminate the out of control robots.

name: Sfera
summary: SFERA - Action platformer. A mix of 3D and retro 2D graphics. You are an assassin for the SFERA corporation. You are tasked with destroying a gang of robots.

name: SFZ Project: E0 Deluxe Remake
summary:
"SFZ Project: Episode Zero. Deluxe Remake" is a complete reimagining of the 2020 mod with updated gameplay and visuals, as well as redesigned Kordon location and various side-quests.

The general plot of the story remains the same - in the Zone there was a third large release, which attracted the attention of Professor Sakharov, who supplied a group of scientists to go to the Chernobyl NPP. The connection with the expedition is cut off and a former mercenary and friend of the professor is sent to the Zone to find out the circumstances.

name: Sfare: Relax your mind
summary: Relax and enjoy what your mind creates. Take your time.

name: SFCave
summary: SFCave is a very simplified cave flyer. The player controls the altitude of a blue ribbon that is constantly moving from left to right through a cave. It's a one button game where the player makes the ribbon move upwards by touching the screen. When not touching the screen the line moves downwards. The goal of the game is to avoid crashing into the cave walls and to stay alive as long as possible. The further into the cave the player gets the cave become more narrow and the pace gets faster. At the end player gets a score based on how long he stays alive.

name: SFCave for Playdate
summary: SFCave ported from Arduboy to the Playdate

name: SFD
summary: SFD is a unique hybrid of tactical RPG and roguelike. Manage a party of adventurers as you attempt to be one of the few to conquer the Sigma Finite Dungeon.

name: SFG Soccer
summary: Over-the-top arcade soccer action! Bicycle kicks, headers, one-touch passes, slide-tackles, instant replays, it's all here. New enhancements include mouse controls, and a two-button 'Casual Mode' for more laid back gamers. An RPG-style leveling system is used for the multi-season Career Mode featuring 64 teams from around the world. Play co-op or solo as you lead your team all the way up to the Division 1 Championship Game!

name: SFX Test
summary: Test cartridge for SNES that features a rudimentary Mario game.

name: SFPD Homicide / Case File: The Body in the Bay
summary: An FMV point and click adventure game where the player has to solve a murder.

name: SF2K: Class Dismissed
summary: Delve into social gameplay like no other, playing with tenuous alliances and bitter rivalries on the harshest battlefield know to humans - the schoolyard playground. Who can you REALLY trust?

name: Sfinx
summary: Wacek and Andzia, a pair of school friends, are told by an old Professor that a flying saucer crashed somewhere on Earth. Poor little alien didn't make it on a sharp interstellar turn... The player guides the two kids trying to find him and help him out.

name: S.F.77
summary: Use your space fighter (S.F.77) to destroy enemy spaceships and collect energy from them. Use energy to upgrade you speed, weapons, or improve shields which will allow you to survive even harder attack waves.
